data.what_is: MioDatos is a marketing automation platform designed for all your marketing needs! You can create marketing campaigns, beautiful emails, social media posts, landing pages, referral campaigns, marketing documents and more! Create marketing campaigns for the quarter, new product launches, holidays and so on. MioDatos also allows companies to create co-branded marketing campaigns then share those campaigns with their channel partners.
data.product_description: MioDatos is a marketing automation platform designed to help vendors share co-branded marketing content with thier channel partners.MioDatos was created with simplicity in mind. Our platform is much simpler than others in the marketing automation space. You can learn how to use each functionality in a few dedicated hours.MioDatos is also the most cost-effective platform in the marketing automation industry. You can receive all the features and benefits of MioDatos for $49.75/month.

features.name: Data Import & Export Tools
features.content: Ability to input, modify and extract data from the application in bulk through a structured file.

features.name: Breadth of Partner Applications
features.content: To what extent are there partner applications readily available for integrating into this product?  Partner applications typically provide complementary, best of breed functionality not offered natively in this product.

features.name: Customization
features.content: System provides sufficient customization to meet business requirements

features.name: User, Role, and Access Management
features.content: Grant access to select data, features, objects, etc. based on the users, user role, groups, etc.

features.name: Internationalization
features.content: Enables users to view and transact business with the same content in multiple languages and currencies.

features.name: Sandbox / Test Environments
features.content: Allows administrators to easily develop and test changes to the CRM deployment.  After changes are made admins can easily migrate the changes into the "live" or "production" environment.

features.name: Performance and Reliability
features.content: Software is consistently available (uptime) and allows users to complete tasks quickly because they are not waiting for the software to respond to an action they took.

features.name: Output Document Generation
features.content: Allows adminstrators to create templates that enable users to quickly generate dynamic documents in various formats based on the data stored in the application.

features.name: Building and Personalizing Emails
features.content: Based on 11 MioDatos reviews. Create and design emails with an editor; manage templates; personalize dynamically

features.name: Sending Outbound Emails
features.content: As reported in 12 MioDatos reviews. Create targeted lists, schedule and manage bulk email sending.

features.name: Automated Email Responses
features.content: Based on 11 MioDatos reviews. Set up automated nurturing emails based on events, online activities, and lead scores

features.name: Landing Pages and Forms
features.content: Build customized landing pages and lead capture forms for specific marketing campaigns to maximize conversion and to capture the right qualifying information. This feature was mentioned in 10 MioDatos reviews.

features.name: Dynamic Content
features.content: As reported in 11 MioDatos reviews. Dynamically customize emails, forms, and landing pages for specific segments of customers and prospects.

features.name: A/B Testing
features.content: Test alternate versions of emails, landing pages, and forms. Learn what works, maximize response rates, and increase conversion.

features.name: Mobile Optimized
features.content: Support mobile-optimized emails, online forms, and landing pages. 10 reviewers of MioDatos have provided feedback on this feature.

features.name: Data Quality Management
features.content: Data quality consists of deduplication, cleansing, and appending your marketing database.

features.name: Segmentation
features.content: Based on 10 MioDatos reviews. Segment your database and build list of target leads and contacts.  Filter on demographic and company attributes (title, company size, location) as well as behavioral filters and CRM information.

features.name: Lead Scoring and Grading
features.content: Automatically qualify and score leads based on demographics as well as prospect online behaviors, including recency and frequency. Assign your own weights to determine lead scores for prioritization. This feature was mentioned in 11 MioDatos reviews.

features.name: Online Behavior Tracking
features.content: Based on 10 MioDatos reviews. Track which emails a prospect opens and clicks, what web-pages they visit, what keywords they use, even what they say on social networks.

features.name: CRM Lead Integration
features.content: Sync lead, contact, account, and opportunity information with your CRM system.

features.name: Program ManagementView full feature definition
features.content: Manage marketing campaigns and programs across multiple channels, including online ads, video campaigns, mobile, virtual events, and social media. Create and optimize program assets such as landing pages, emails, campaigns, and lists. Track program objectives, results, and costs to assess the program ROI. This feature was mentioned in 10 MioDatos reviews.

features.name: Social Campaigns
features.content: Schedule automated posts to one or more social accounts; use or integrate with URL shortening services; and measure likes, comments, replies, and retweets. 10 reviewers of MioDatos have provided feedback on this feature.

features.name: Basic Reporting
features.content: Access pre-built and custom reports and dashboards to measure leads by source/campaign/month, email performance, landing page performance, and web and social activity. Create report subscriptions that can automatically send updates to your team and executives. 11 reviewers of MioDatos have provided feedback on this feature.

features.name: Lead Management
features.content: Ability to upload and automatically distribute leads, as well as lead nurturing and scoring capabilities.

features.name: Content Management
features.content: Allows channel partners to create co-branded or locally customized content from centrally managed templates.

features.name: Group and User Management
features.content: Ability to assign groups and users different levels of access depending on the role of those groups and users.

features.name: Email Marketing
features.content: Ability for channel partners to create personalized emails, newsletters, or announcements using your branding and content.

features.name: Search Marketing
features.content: Allow channel partners to generate traffic and enhance visibility via search engines through both paid and unpaid activities.

features.name: Web Syndication Management
features.content: Ability to distribute and showcase your product and solutions via your channel partners' websites.

features.name: Social Media Management
features.content: Ability for partners to schedule and manage content across social media channels.

features.name: Events
features.content: Provides partners with pre-built event templates that include automated email workflows for event management (i.e. webinars, in-person event registration, etc.).

features.name: Microsite Management
features.content: Ability to setup and personalize co-branded microsites or landing pages.

features.name: Campaign Performance
features.content: Provides visibility into marketing campaign performance to then optimize strategy moving forward.

features.name: Partner Performance
features.content: Identifies high performing channel partners to be able to target them with more content, campaigns, and marketing development funds.

features.name: Fund Tracking
features.content: Provides the ability to track marketing development funds (MDF), like funds uploaded, funds claimed, and funds dispersed.

features.name: Partner Engagement
features.content: Ability to enourage partners to use your platform, which can involve learning and engagement (i.e. leaderboards, gamification, etc.).

initial_reviews.review_title: Does the Job, but has a steep learning curve
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about MioDatos?
I like how the system is constantly updated with the latest trends and technologies, so it's always up to date on the latest marketing techniques. For instance, they have recently updated the system to include new features like Facebook ads and LinkedIn groups. Our social media outreach has increased as a result of these updates. I also like how the team always notifies me via email when an update has been made, along with instructions on how to use the new features.

What do you dislike about MioDatos?
The interface is a bit confusing, and the learning curve is a bit steep. Also, their support isn't good, and if you want to use HTML emails instead of drag and drop, they don't have someone to help you accomplish that.

What problems is MioDatos solving and how is that benefiting you?
It has helped me track my leads, follow up with them, and close more sales. It has also helped me to segment my list and target my marketing messages more effectively.

initial_reviews.review_title: Versatile marketing platform, however to generate leads, must use contact lists.
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about MioDatos?
The platform provides us with comprehensive analytics after a campaign has run for a certain period of time, for example after one weeek, two weeks, and so on. These analytics contains insightful information about our prospects and customers. The information we get from these analytics helps us measure the effectiveness of our campaigns and make it easy for us to identify which campaigns are working and which ones need more attention.

What do you dislike about MioDatos?
Without uploading our company's contact lists onto the platform, I am unable to create leads and referrals. The platform relies on the contact list too much. A more varied platform that can produce leads from other variety of significant sources, such as SEOs, would be better because it would increase the likelihood that our company will receive more leads from other sources other than social media and contact lists.  Leads from Search Engines like Google or Bing would also be equally useful for our business as well.

What problems is MioDatos solving and how is that benefiting you?
I am able to pick up a lot of knowledge about the industry I work in. Understanding the market is crucial to our business because it allows us to strategically position our products and set their prices to get the most out of the market. Additionally, I can spot market opportunities and trends that may make us need to change our business strategy.

initial_reviews.review_title: Extend Your Marketing Efforts With MioDatos
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about MioDatos?
I like that the platform is cloud-based and available on the web as a website. I simply use it from the browser without downloading and installing it, and it works just fine. This also enables me to stay always updated even when I'm not in the office because I just use my phone's web browser to log in and view updates and any information that I need.

The platform is also very responsive; it looks the same on the phone and on a computer, so I don't get confused when I'm switching between devices.

What do you dislike about MioDatos?
There is no way to specify the number of times you would like a particular email or post should be shared or sent to prospects. It occasionally bombards clients and prospects with texts and emails. Although this could be beneficial in some ways, on occasion, I worry that it might irritate some clients or possibly mark our business as spam. I would prefer if the platform provided a means for me to strategically designate how frequently and precisely I want a particular piece of material to be shared with and emailed to prospects.

What problems is MioDatos solving and how is that benefiting you?
Since I started utilizing this platform, I've noticed a considerable rise in the number of leads I receive. Even though it took a while, after three months, I started seeing an increase in new prospects, and I can affirm the platform is clearly worthwhile. My lead count has steadily increased in recent years.

initial_reviews.review_title: All Marketing Needs And Features Under One Platform
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about MioDatos?
When developing marketing content for our company, such as product announcements, emails, social media postings, and landing pages, we just put them into campaigns that last four to six months. During this time, we can concentrate more on running the business while extending our marketing efforts without having to send and share this content with our prospective clients repeatedly, as we used to. It is also feasible to alter or update the running campaigns. When we obtain new prospective clients, we just update the current campaigns to accommodate them rather than creating new ones. This saved us a significant amount of time and work.

The ability to link social media accounts is another helpful feature of MioDatos. For instance, we connected our official Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn pages to the platform and now our news feeds are conveniently populated. This offers us a greater understanding of what our followers are posting. Since the posts are presented with comments, it makes it easier for us to respond to them right away and maintain a conversation with them.

I should also point out how keen I noted the platform is to quickly help users (especially new users get) familiar with it. For instance, they give you an Excel template when uploading a contacts file so you can see the type and format of the file they expect.

What do you dislike about MioDatos?
The only issue I had with the platform was when I was first setting up the account. The verification code took so long that I had to shift my attention and focus on something else while I waited for it so that I could continue setting up the account. I eventually received it and was able to finish setting up the account. I would advise them to investigate this matter as it may turn off many prospective clients, as such a delay may generate a bad image that the company is untrustworthy. It's worth noting that  I haven't had any additional issues with the platform after the account was fully set.

What problems is MioDatos solving and how is that benefiting you?
By automating the marketing process, our company is able to increase sales and conversations.

Mostly I use the platform to automate email marketing, social media marketing and generating leads. Usually, this is a time-consuming process, but with MioDatos, I'm able to save a lot of time and resources.

What do you dislike about MioDatos?
We have shared a few suggestions to improve the UI and reporting dashboards. Their product team is taking a little more time to implement and roll out the changes. I hope they should speed up the process.

What problems is MioDatos solving and how is that benefiting you?

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about MioDatos?
The platform provides us with comprehensive analytics after a campaign has run for a certain period of time, for example after one weeek, two weeks, and so on. These analytics contains insightful information about our prospects and customers. The information we get from these analytics helps us measure the effectiveness of our campaigns and make it easy for us to identify which campaigns are working and which ones need more attention.

What do you dislike about MioDatos?
Without uploading our company's contact lists onto the platform, I am unable to create leads and referrals. The platform relies on the contact list too much. A more varied platform that can produce leads from other variety of significant sources, such as SEOs, would be better because it would increase the likelihood that our company will receive more leads from other sources other than social media and contact lists.  Leads from Search Engines like Google or Bing would also be equally useful for our business as well.

I am able to pick up a lot of knowledge about the industry I work in. Additionally, I can spot market opportunities and trends that may make us need to change our business strategy.

all_reviews.review_title: Extend Your Marketing Efforts With MioDatos
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about MioDatos?
I like that the platform is cloud-based and available on the web as a website. I simply use it from the browser without downloading and installing it, and it works just fine. This also enables me to stay always updated even when I'm not in the office because I just use my phone's web browser to log in and view updates and any information that I need.

The platform is also very responsive; it looks the same on the phone and on a computer, so I don't get confused when I'm switching between devices.

What do you dislike about MioDatos?
There is no way to specify the number of times you would like a particular email or post should be shared or sent to prospects. It occasionally bombards clients and prospects with texts and emails. Although this could be beneficial in some ways, on occasion, I worry that it might irritate some clients or possibly mark our business as spam. I would prefer if the platform provided a means for me to strategically designate how frequently and precisely I want a particular piece of material to be shared with and emailed to prospects.

What problems is MioDatos solving and how is that benefiting you?
Since I started utilizing this platform, I've noticed a considerable rise in the number of leads I receive. Even though it took a while, after three months, I started seeing an increase in new prospects, and I can affirm the platform is clearly worthwhile. My lead count has steadily increased in recent years.

all_reviews.review_title: All Marketing Needs And Features Under One Platform
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about MioDatos?
When developing marketing content for our company, such as product announcements, emails, social media postings, and landing pages, we just put them into campaigns that last four to six months. During this time, we can concentrate more on running the business while extending our marketing efforts without having to send and share this content with our prospective clients repeatedly, as we used to. It is also feasible to alter or update the running campaigns. When we obtain new prospective clients, we just update the current campaigns to accommodate them rather than creating new ones. This saved us a significant amount of time and work.

The ability to link social media accounts is another helpful feature of MioDatos. For instance, we connected our official Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn pages to the platform and now our news feeds are conveniently populated. This offers us a greater understanding of what our followers are posting. Since the posts are presented with comments, it makes it easier for us to respond to them right away and maintain a conversation with them.

I should also point out how keen I noted the platform is to quickly help users (especially new users get) familiar with it. For instance, they give you an Excel template when uploading a contacts file so you can see the type and format of the file they expect.

What do you dislike about MioDatos?
The only issue I had with the platform was when I was first setting up the account. The verification code took so long that I had to shift my attention and focus on something else while I waited for it so that I could continue setting up the account. I eventually received it and was able to finish setting up the account. I would advise them to investigate this matter as it may turn off many prospective clients, as such a delay may generate a bad image that the company is untrustworthy. It's worth noting that  I haven't had any additional issues with the platform after the account was fully set.

What problems is MioDatos solving and how is that benefiting you?
By automating the marketing process, our company is able to increase sales and conversations.

Mostly I use the platform to automate email marketing, social media marketing and generating leads. Usually, this is a time-consuming process, but with MioDatos, I'm able to save a lot of time and resources.

This offers us a greater understanding of what our followers are posting. Since the posts are presented with comments, it makes it easier for us to respond to them right away and maintain a conversation with them.

I should also point out how keen I noted the platform is to quickly help users (especially new users get) familiar with it. For instance, they give you an Excel template when uploading a contacts file so you can see the type and format of the file they expect.

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about MioDatos?
review_question_answers.answer: The only issue I had with the platform was when I was first setting up the account. The verification code took so long that I had to shift my attention and focus on something else while I waited for it so that I could continue setting up the account. I eventually received it and was able to finish setting up the account. I would advise them to investigate this matter as it may turn off many prospective clients, as such a delay may generate a bad image that the company is untrustworthy. It's worth noting that  I haven't had any additional issues with the platform after the account was fully set.
